```{r fig.height=6, fig.width=10}
library(ggplot2)

load("tw2016data.RData")

qplot(fecha, conteo, data = datos, geom = c("point", "line"),
      colour = candidato, main = "Carrera Presidencial 2016 en Twitter",
      xlab = "Fecha", ylab = "Número de seguidores")
```
